item.title: Party in London
item.description: The city of London is known to be very expensive, whether it be the price of housing or access to the various clubs called “trendy”. We are going to tell you about the most friendly and good-value places, and then we’ll talk a bit more about the clubs in some of the most famous neighborhoods of the capital such as Soho, Brixton and Shoreditch. Leicester Square / Piccadilly good deals It is sometimes difficult to get out in the capital when there is a lack of money, so I have listed for you the best plans to enjoy the nightlife that London is famous for !
